results.title: Red yeast rice induces less muscle fatigue symptom than simvastatin in dyslipidemic patients: a single center randomized pilot trial
results.text_hl: Red yeast rice induces less @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@muscle fatigue symptom@@@ than @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in dyslipidemic @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@: a single center randomized pilot trial

results.title: Simvastatin-induced lupus erythematosus.
results.text_hl: We report the case of a 79-year-old man who had onset of @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@myalgia@@@, and @DISEASE_Chest_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@pleuritic chest pain@@@ 3 months after initiation of therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Khosla R, Butman AN, Hammer DF. Simvastatin-induced lupus erythematosus. South Med J. 1998 Sep;91(9):873-4. PMID: 9743064
citations.BibTeX: @article{9743064, title={Simvastatin-induced lupus erythematosus.}, author={Khosla R and Butman AN and Hammer DF}, journal={South Med J}, volume={91}, number={9}, pages={873-4}}

results.title: [Adverse muscle effects of a podofyllotoxin-containing cytotoxic drug product with simvastatin].
results.text_hl: We describe four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, for whom concurrent administration of a podofyllotoxin-containing cytotoxic drug product and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ caused severe adverse effects on muscles, including @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@muscle pain@@@, @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@soreness@@@ or @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@ or @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@, and in some @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ also disintegration of @DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ tissue, i.e.

results.title: [A case of drug-induced pneumonia possibly associated with simvastatin].
results.text_hl: A 59-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ was admitted because of general @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @DISEASE_Cough @DISEASE_MESH:D003371 @@@cough@@@ and progressive @DISEASE_Dyspnea @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@dyspnea@@@ about 5 months after treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin-induced rhabdomyolysis in a patient with chronic renal failure.
results.text_hl: Her symptoms of @DISEASE_Myalgia @DISEASE_MESH:D063806 @@@muscle pain@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, myoglobulinuria, @DISEASE_Oliguria @DISEASE_MESH:D009846 @@@oliguria@@@ and @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D011654 @@@pulmonary oedema@@@ appeared 48 h after the first dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Voriconazole-Induced Hepatitis via Simvastatin- and Lansoprazole-Mediated Drug Interactions: A Case Report and Review of the Literature.
results.text_hl: Within 2 weeks of taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, a @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl CoA reductase@@@ (statin) therapy, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ redeveloped @<m>DISEASE_Fatigue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@, @DISEASE_Jaundice @DISEASE_MESH:D007565 @@@jaundice@@@, and @DISEASE_Cholestasis @DISEASE_MESH:D002779 @@@cholestatic hepatitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Lopez JL, Tayek JA. Voriconazole-Induced Hepatitis via Simvastatin- and Lansoprazole-Mediated Drug Interactions: A Case Report and Review of the Literature. Drug Metab Dispos. 2016 Jan;44(1):124-6. PMID: 26502771
